results.title: Pregabalin and simvastatin: first report of a case of rhabdomyolysis.
results.text_hl: He was taking multiple @DISEASE_Pain @DISEASE_MESH:D010146 @@@pain@@@ and @DISEASE_Drug_Resistant_Epilepsy @DISEASE_MESH:D000069279 @@@neuropathic medications@@@ and had recently started taking @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ (e.g., @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@Zestril@@@) and @CHEMICAL_Simvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@.

citations.NLM: Kaufman MB, Choy M. Pregabalin and simvastatin: first report of a case of rhabdomyolysis. P T. 2012 Oct;37(10):579-95. PMID: 23115467
